mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of Caleb Weddle
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of Caleb Weddle Jonas Lee Weddle, son of Caleb who died 05.13.1894 when he was under 21 years of age Cyrena E. Weddle, Administrator Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 329, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
